Name: Heat Armlet
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Charmander, Charmeleon, and Charizard.  You can get a Heat Armlet at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Char-Claw, a Char-Fang, and a Fiery Heart. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
